mapper.select: select * from notices order by n_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into notices(subject, writer,content, f_name, pwd, write_date, views) values(#{subject}, #{writer},#{content}, #{f_name}, #{pwd}, now(), 0)
mapper.update: update notices set views = views + 1 where n_idx = #{n_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notices order by n_idx desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset};
